Nov 2021 - Apr 2022

Wissenschaftliche Hilfskraft (HiWi) - AI - Reinforcement Learning

Institute für Konstruktionstechnik und Techniches Design | Uni Stuttgart | Stuttgart, Germany
  • Complete development of a Deep-Q-learning model to optimize a contour in order to homogenize the contact pressure resulting from a press-fit of a shaft-hub joint according to norm DIN 7190.
  • Validation using iterative optimization based on material properties.
  • Creation of a dataset with the parameters for optimal contours and thereby prediction of contour profiles when these parameters are given as inputs.
Oct 2021 - Apr 2022

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
